name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3rd Generation 5th Anniversary Live 「Square of Magic!」【#3期生5周年LIVE】 [ZoTCTkD5VBI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Akugyaku-uta' by Shiranui Flare and Houshou Marine.
Transition scene with visual effects and a carrot icon.
Performance of the song 'CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA' by Shirogane Noel and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: 大体曖昧なんだよね
subtitles.english: It's mostly vague, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 愛の存在証明なんて
subtitles.english: Things like proof of love's existence.

subtitles.original: 君が教えてくれないか
subtitles.english: Won't you tell me about it?

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent dozens of nights,

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べてみて
subtitles.english: Try lining up "I love you"s.

subtitles.original: 何十回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent dozens of nights,

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the finest full-course meal.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから きっと一生は無理だよね
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, a whole lifetime is probably impossible, right?

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 胸がとても痛いんだ
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, my chest hurts so much.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには分かり合えなくなって
subtitles.english: Since we're human, sometimes we just stop understanding each other.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry,

subtitles.original: また君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry again.

subtitles.original: でも自信がないないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But I have no-no-no-no confidence, you know?

subtitles.original: 変わりたくないないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to change-change-change-change, you know?

subtitles.original: 君以外会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to see anyone but you, you know?

subtitles.original: なんで勝手だね
subtitles.english: How selfish of me.

subtitles.original: 大体曖昧だったよね
subtitles.english: It was mostly vague, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 愛の存在証なんて
subtitles.english: Things like proof of love's existence.

subtitles.original: 君がそこにいるのにね
subtitles.english: Even though you're right there.

subtitles.original: 何百回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent hundreds of nights,

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べてみて
subtitles.english: Try lining up "I love you"s.

subtitles.original: 何百回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent hundreds of nights,

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the finest full-course meal.

subtitles.original: 離れないで傍に居てくれたのは
subtitles.english: The one who stayed by my side without leaving,

subtitles.original: 結局君一人だったよね
subtitles.english: Was you alone in the end, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 涙のスパイスは君の胸に
subtitles.english: The spice of tears will likely remain,

subtitles.original: 残ってしまうだろうけど
subtitles.english: In your heart, but...

subtitles.original: 何千回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent thousands of nights,

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll line up "I love you"s.

subtitles.original: 何千回の夜を過ごしたって得られぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you couldn't get even if you spent thousands of nights,

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the finest full-course meal.

subtitles.original: 何万回の夜を過ごしたって忘れぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you won't forget even if you spend tens of thousands of nights,

subtitles.original: 愛してるを並べるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll line up "I love you"s.

subtitles.original: 何万回の夜を過ごしたって忘れぬような
subtitles.english: The kind you won't forget even if you spend tens of thousands of nights,

subtitles.original: 最高級のフルコースを頂戴
subtitles.english: Give me the finest full-course meal.

subtitles.original:
CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA
作詞：森雪之丞 作曲：清岡千穂
subtitles.english:
CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA
Lyrics: Yukinojo Mori / Composition: Chiho Kiyooka

subtitles.original: 光る雲を突き抜け Fly Away
subtitles.english: Piercing through the glowing clouds, fly away

subtitles.original: (Fly Away)
subtitles.english: (Fly Away)

subtitles.original: からだじゅうに広がるパノラマ
subtitles.english: A panorama spreading throughout my body

subtitles.original: 顔を蹴られた地球が怒って
subtitles.english: The Earth is angry from being kicked in the face,

subtitles.original: (怒って)
subtitles.english: (It's angry)

subtitles.original: 火山を爆発させる
subtitles.english: Making volcanoes erupt

subtitles.original: 溶けた氷の中に
subtitles.english: Inside the melted ice,

subtitles.original: 恐竜がいたら 玉乗り仕込みたいね
subtitles.english: If there's a dinosaur, I want to teach it how to balance on a ball

subtitles.original: CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA 何が起きても気分は
subtitles.english: CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA, no matter what happens, I feel like...

subtitles.original: へのへのカッパ
subtitles.english: It's a piece of cake

subtitles.original: CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA 胸がパチパチするほど騒ぐ元気玉
subtitles.english: CHA-LA HEAD-CHA-LA, a Spirit Bomb making my chest crackle with energy

subtitles.original: Sparking!
subtitles.english: Sparking!

subtitles.original: 空を急降下ジェットコースター
subtitles.english: Diving through the sky on a roller coaster

subtitles.original: (コースター)
subtitles.english: (Coaster)

subtitles.original: 落ちてゆくよ パニックの手前
subtitles.english: Falling down, just on the verge of panic
